text: 1.23 Lo 4.16-18, Sng 106.20, Jer 2.11, Ese 8.10, Apo 17.29 God pel mɨdep ak nop kelɨgɨl, yɨb awl nop ak ma dad aplanɨbal. Tap yepɨs pen ogɨnap gɨlɨl dɨl, yɨb awl dad aplanɨbal. Tap yepɨs anɨb okok, yawl tek ak, sab chag tek ak, yoy salaw tek ak, anɨb okok gɨlɨl, yɨb awl dad aplanɨbal. Pen tap yepɨs binɨb pel ma mɨdep tek ak abe gɨlɨl, yɨb awl dad aplanɨbal.
